# PAD::GET_IS_USING_ALTERNATE_DRIVEBY

## Summary
Returns whether the player has the alternate driveby profile option set

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns profile setting 225.
